extendedInfo.description: The foundation for your professional careerValidate your skills and differentiate yourself as better able to work with Windows Server 2008 in a real-world business context.â¢	Windows Server 2008 Active Directory, Configuringâ¢	Windows Server 2008 Network Infrastructure, Configuringâ¢	Windows Server 2008, Server AdministratorApp features: There are three main functions focusing on program Training The questions are categorized according to the courses in the Windows Server 2008 program to strengthen candidates' knowledgeIn this section, candidate can choose the number of questions in order or random, set the countdown timer for each practicing item.  Exam  	Candidate will have the opportunity to test with the number of questions in the same time as the exam. After completing, the result will be notified immediately   History  	Candidate can review the result of previous examThere are two types of questions that app can support:â¢	Single choiceâ¢	Multiple choiceSpeed up your career and make your exam easier with this training app as your guide
